title: Timeless Truth in Truthless Times: Answers to Tough Questions about God, Christianity, and the Bible
description: In this book, you will find insightful and concise answers to 35 tough questions about God, Christianity and the Bible, such as:Who created God?Why did God create people knowing they will end up in hell?Why is there so much evil in this world?Can I live a good moral life without God?It is the culmination of 15 years of Christian Apologetics (defending the Christian faith) and youth ministry.More about the book and the author: https://www.amazon.com/George-Bassili...
author: George Bassilios
